title: Tim Gettys Live Reaction Metroid Prime 4 Freakout! - Kinda Funny E3 2017
description:
Tim Gettys loses his mind at the Metroid Prime 4 announcement.

transcript_chunks.text: no no don't touch me it's not happening Starfield I think I might need I might need the notebook again here Andy oh **** **** I don't believe anybody anymore they is it retro is it **** retro oh now in development but whatever it's got to be retro they just you lied to me Mr. Nintendo and I love you so goddamn much for it D Yoshi what the **** h
